Detailed Description

template<class ValueType, class KeyType, int MAX_GAP, class LockType>
class SkipList< ValueType, KeyType, MAX_GAP, MemStorage, LockType >

The definition and implementation of the SkipList(Actually, it is a deterministic skip list).
